item.description:
Campaign for Liberty Members,

We must keep the pressure on our representatives to pass H.R.1207 (The Federal Reserve Transparency Act of 2009).

The Bill is under review by the House Financial Services Committee, which is Chaired by Congressman Barney Frank. Congressman Frank needs to hear how many people are taking a stand and demanding accountability and transparency in government.

We need to flood his lines (all day) with calls in support of H.R.1207!

YOU can reach Congressman Frank by calling the Capital Switch-Board and asking to be directed to his office at: (202) 224-3121

or, YOU can call his main office at (617) 332-3920.

Make a few calls today... It takes less than 5-minutes!
item.name: May Day - Phone Bomb Congressman Barney Frank !
